question:
Examine the video at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1htKBjuUWec.

What does Teal'c say in response to the question "Isn't that hot?"

trajectory.question:
Examine the video at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1htKBjuUWec.

What does Teal'c say in response to the question "Isn't that hot?"

trajectory.actor_reasoning: I need to find the specific line from the YouTube video, so I'll search for the video and its transcript or quotes.

args.query: Teal'c "Isn't that hot?" Stargate SG-1 quote

tool_executed.name: web_search
tool_executed.result:
Found 3 relevant web results:

1. Teal'c coffee first time - YouTube
   URL: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1htKBjuUWec
   Site: youtube.com
   Date: Jul 12, 2012
   Summary: Wow this coffee's great I was just thinking that yeah is that cinnamon chicory tea oak isn't that hot extremely.

2. Hear me out... Best Teal'c moment in the show? : r/Stargate - Reddit
   URL: https://www.reddit.com/r/Stargate/comments/1ld1g7n/hear_me_out_best_tealc_moment_in_the_show/
   Site: reddit.com
   Date: Jun 16, 2025
   Summary: And, of course, the famous Teal'c coffee scene: "Isn't that hot?" "Extremely" - S3 E16 Urgo. 50 upvotes · 8 comments. [Request] Teal'c Gif and ...

3. What is the funniest scene in the entire series. - Facebook
   URL: https://www.facebook.com/groups/stargatefansunited/posts/10162067968523713/
   Site: facebook.com
   Date: Nov 13, 2024
   Summary: ... Teal'c who's drinking coffee straight from the pot: "Isn't that hot ?". .. "Extremely !" https://youtu. be/1htKBjuUWec?feature=shared.

trajectory.actor_reasoning:
Multiple sources referencing that clip, including the video title/summary and fan discussions, quote Teal'c’s reply as “Extremely.” 
FINAL ANSWER: Extremely
